metadata.name: Planning Tasks
metadata.description: Pre-defined tasks for work item planning and analysis phase
metadata.author: tacosontitan

templates.title: Review Feature
templates.description: Review the feature and its associated work items to ensure alignment with business objectives, coordination with team members, and add tasks if necessary.

templates.title: Review Work Item
templates.description: Review the work item and all pre-defined tasks to ensure that tasks are aligned with business objectives and add tasks if necessary.

templates.title: Reproduce Locally
templates.description: Attempt to reproduce the issue locally to better understand the problem and identify potential solutions.

templates.title: Review Existing Implementation(s)
templates.description: Review existing implementations to gather insights and derive potential solutions.

templates.title: Meet with Feature Leader
templates.description: Meet with the feature leader to discuss the work item's scope within the grand scheme of the feature.

templates.title: Meet with Subject Matter Expert
templates.description: Meet with the noted subject matter expert to discuss the work item's implementation.

templates.title: Meet with Product Owners
templates.description: Meet with product owners to clarify requirements and ensure alignment with business objectives.

templates.title: Meet with Stakeholders
templates.description: Meet with stakeholders to gather feedback and ensure the work item aligns with their expectations.

templates.title: Meet with Quality Assurance
templates.description: Meet with QA to discuss test cases and ensure alignment on quality expectations.

templates.title: Create Implementation Tasks
templates.description: After conducting the necessary reviews and meetings, create tasks that represent the steps needed to execute the work item's acceptance criteria (be sure to account for non-functional requirements).
